code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import MetricCard from'./MetricCard';import FilterBar from'./FilterBar';import'../Styling/DashboardOverview.css';import'../Styling/FilterBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardOverview=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/isp-data/').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setData(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-overview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Historical Dashboard Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-grid",children:data?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"Throughput",value:data.throughput+' Mbps'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"Min RTT",value:data.min_rtt+' ms'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"Packet Loss",value:data.packet_loss+'%'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"Country",value:data.country}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"City",value:data.city||'N/A'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetricCard,{title:"ISP",value:data.isp})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})})]});};export default DashboardOverview;
